paper_title: On the General Ranks of QP Representations
abstract: We propose a mutation formula the general rank from a principal component ${\rm PC}(δ)$ of representations to another one ${\rm PC}(\ep)$ for a quiver with potential. We give sufficient conditions for the formula to hold. In particular, the formula holds when any of $δ$ and $\ep$ is reachable. We discover several related mutation invariants.
publication_venue: 30 pages, Comments are welcome. v2. typo fixing; v3. change most $τ$ to $\hatτ$; v4. no longer call it an "algorithm" + minor changes
